short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds accessibility and usability improvements to אייוועלט.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Based on the original extension by the 'ivelt extension creator', we proudly introduce iVelt Helper v2. This meticulously crafted browser extension is designed to provide a seamless, enjoyable, and enhanced אייוועלט forum experience. This modernized extension brings a host of powerful features that ensure a value-added browsing adventure right to your fingertips.

▪ Keyboard Navigation: Navigate the forum pages using left or right keyboard keys and scroll through posts with up or down keyboard keys.
▪ Post Submission Shortcut: Submit your posts swiftly with a Ctrl+Enter shortcut.
▪ Post Preview Shortcut: Use the Alt+V shortcut to preview your posts, available in both quick 
▪ post and full editor options.
▪ Shortcut to Active Threads: A rapid Alt+A shortcut takes you directly to the page containing active threads.
▪ Popup Notification Shortcut: Stay updated on forum activity with a handy Alt+N shortcut for popup notifications.
▪ Inbox Notifications: Receive alerts about new inbox messages regardless of whether you are currently browsing אייוועלט.
▪ New Response and New Page Notifications: Get notified about new responses on topic pages and when a new page is created in an active thread.
▪ Quote last reply only: When responding to posts with multiple quotes, conveniently quote only the last reply.
▪ Google Thread Search: Utilize Google's search capabilities to find specific threads in the forum.
▪ Form Security: Avert accidental triggering of 'mark all notifications as read' and shield your form inputs from unexpected loss.
▪ Various Fixes and Options: Enjoy a smoother forum experience with various other enhancements and customizable options.
▪ Advanced Notifications - Conveniently hide notifications in user control panel and use Alt+M shortcut to navigate to the next unread notification.
▪ Enhanced Printing Capabilities - Leverage the ability to print multiple pages.
